text: Convict () is a 1936 Soviet drama movie directed by Yevgeni Chervyakov.1936 годЗаключенные It stars Mikhail Astangov, Mikhail Yanshin, and Boris Dobronravov. == Actors == * Mikhail Astangov as Kostya * Mikhail Yanshin as Max * Boris Dobronravov as Director Gromov * Vera Yanukova as Sonya * Nadezhda Yermakovich as Margarita Ivanova == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1936 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Yevgeni Chervyakov
title: Convict (movie)
